text: Days after Jenna Dewan and Channing Tatum announced their split after nine years of marriage, the world has been quick to speculate about the reasons behind their break - up. And while the world is currently mourning the loss of yet another one of our favourite A - list couples, we have a feeling the World of Dance star might have already known a break - up was on the cards back in January, as a result of an eerily - accurate Tarot card reading. Advertisement - Continue Reading Below In the reading – which was filmed for Jenna's YouTube channel – the actress met with spiritual teacher Todd Savvas ( whom she adorably calls ‘ Merlin ’ ) to find out what's in store for 2018, reports E!
